description: Request for a Screening Opinion under the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 as to whether the following proposals constitute Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) development: Change of  the one-way roundabout into a two-way traffic system with the closure of the western arm of the existing roundabout, partial opening of the arboretum, creation of a new accessible public space and alterations to pedestrian and cylist routes.
decision_conditions: A screening opinion be adopted stating that an Environmental Impact Statement is not required for this proposal, in accordance with the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017.    The development, whilst falling into Schedule 2's 'Description of Development 10 (f) (Infrastructure projects), 'Construction of roads' and exceeding the thresholds listed in column 2, is not within a sensitive area as defined in Part 1 Regulation 2 (1) of the Regulations and, subject to identified mitigation measures,  would not have significant effects on the local environment to the extent that it would necessitate the submission of an EIA.
